column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////As far as the space
column2: it was more than big enough
column3: and I loved the lay-out. Our server was extremely personable
column4: and did an excellent job keeping up with food
column5: and allowed me to just enjoy hosting. They have different fixed plated options. We also paid an additional $100 to have a private make-shift bar with a private tender. It was totally the way to go!!! It allowed me to have a cash bar without it coming across as tacky. Also
column6: the manager closed the check out with me
column7: and took the time to explain the final number.
